He manipulates and forecasts weather, terrain, and fire (druid?)
He's a statesman, inventor, and strategist (bard or rogue? He was a legalist, though, so bard might be out since LN is the most likely alignment)

I hope this is a decent base. Let me know if I can provide more information.

Hey man! How's it going?

Ok, this is a really cool character to come up with. However, you must undertsand that there will be some aspect of him that you'll need to ignore in order to "translate" him into Neverwinter Nights.

So, before I try to come up with a character for him, I'd like to tell you my interpretation of each of the characteristics you mentioned for him:

He manipulates Weather / Fire: Definitely Druid.

He's a Legalist (our first issue in terms of NWN): LN I agree here too, but I would recommend RPing him this way, rather than restricting the class combo by selecting this alignment this way. In other words, this is the aspect I would choose to ignore, because the rest make for a really cool and differentiated NWN character.

He was a strategist and inventor: 16 INT and Craft Traps skill

He makes others around him fight better and enemies fight worse: Definitely Bard with Curse Song

He makes frequent use of traps: Trap Skills.

He created a repeating Crossbow: Zen Archery + Rapid Reload (I wouldn't waste Weapon Focus on a Druid build, but that's up to you)

So, IMO, what you should aim for here is a Druid / Bard / Rogue with at least 18 levels of Druid for Dragon Shape, 16 Bard at least for the best Bard Song cost/benefits and also GMW for your crossbow. And then you have 6 levels to play around with. At least 3 Rogue is recommendable. So, perhaps the best possible spread would be Druid 18 / Bard 17 / Rogue 5 with 12 / 4 / 4 pre-epic.

That means you'll only have 1 level of Rogue left for your dumps into trap skills in epics, but I think that could be a good character. It would by no means be a monster powerbuild and would most likely be very hard to play on WoG, but that's how I'd make him.

What do you think? Does this make sense to you?

posts.author: Maximillian_Kane
posts.content:
Hey man!

Ok, there's a lot to work on in this build.

Firstly, let's talk about stats: you should NEVER waste stat points on the physical stats on a Druid build, because you'll be using shapes to fight, and shapes override the physical stats, which means you won't have ANY use for stat points going into STR, DEX or CON, so they should all be at 8.

Then we have CHA, which is the stat that modifies your Bard spells. You should have 16 CHA no matter what to be able to cast all Bard spells.

Finally, we have INT 16, which is part of the concept of this build. You can start with 14 INT if you want and pump STR to be able to wear armor, something like a Chain Shirt while in Human form.

I can see right away that you've never actually played a Bard, because you didn't take Curse Song or Lingering Song, and you forgot about CHA. So, maybe, to make this guy viable, you should go with PDK after all. Otherwise there just may be too many complications for you to level him. It's tough to level on WoG, and moreso to START with a concept character such as this one. IMO you should start with something more powerful, get to know the server and then make this guy.

But, let's move forward, shall we?

Zen Archery can only be taken at level 6 the earliest, so you need to move it around. Other feats you must take and haven't: Knockdown (for your shapes), Curse Song (to debuff enemies with your Bard Song), and Lingering Song (to make your Bard Song more useful (it's the reason you're taking Bard at all in this build), and DRAGON SHAPE. I mean, if you're not going for Dragon Shape, there's literally no reason for you to bother with Druid 18. But, you'll need to take Great Wisdoms with all your epic feats so as to qualify for DS by level 39 (it requires WIS 30).

That mean you're most likely going to have to forget about Spell Focus and Spell Penetration for this guy. Extend Spell is a must, Empower Spell is very good, Maximize Spell is worthless for this guy.

I appreciate the attempt, but this guy might be a stiffer challenge than you can face right now in terms of building.

Why don't you try the Druid 32 / PDK 5 / Rogue 3 we talked about? I think it'll be better. I'll build this guy for you with Bard and post here when I have time.

Take care, bro!

Hey man!

You should be a summoner with Druids on WoG (and anywhere else for that matter). I'd refer you to my Guide to the class on the Game Guides section. It's a good read to learn how to play the class. You don't need Zen Archery that much because you'll be doing really crappy damage with your attacks. Most of your damage will come from your Animal Companion, your summons, and your TRAPS! You wanted a strategist, and that's what this guy will be. He'll also have Bard Spells and Full Bard Song and Curse Song for +7 AB and AC, and damage to opponents. Best part is: You can sing in Dragon Shape. I had TOTALLY forgotten to take the Bard feats in my 5-minute attempt of a build this morning. Now I've had to remove Expertise and Improved Critical for Curse Song and Lingering Song. I can't say that it'll be very powerful, but KUDOS for the originality of the concept!
